scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all
scripts.kill: node -e "try { process.platform === 'win32' ? require('child_process').execSync('taskkill /f /im node.exe 2>nul', {stdio: 'ignore'}) : require('child_process').execSync('pkill -f \"node\" 2>/dev/null', {stdio: 'ignore'}); } catch(e) { console.log('No processes to kill'); }"
scripts.restart: npm run kill && npm run dev
